QuestData.Title: The Allens' Storm Cellar
QuestData.Description: Lord Godfrey is leading the attack near the Forsaken's landing area. See what you can do to help us keep the Forsaken back.$B$BI've been told Godfrey has commandeered the storm cellar in the Allen Farmstead, far to the west. Seek him there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lord Godfrey inside the storm cellar of the Allen Farmstead in Gilneas.
QuestData.RewardText: The Forsaken are here in full strength, $n. We barely have enough men to hold them back.
